qa_pairs.question: What is Pinegap?
qa_pairs.answer: Pinegap is an AI-powered equity research platform designed to supercharge equity analysts. It helps uncover actionable insights, expand stock coverage efficiently, and accelerate idea generation. Source: https://www.pinegap.ai/

qa_pairs.question: Who is Pinegap built for?
qa_pairs.answer: Pinegap is built 'By-Side' and 'For-Buy Side', meaning it's specifically designed to meet the needs of buy-side equity analysts at hedge funds, mutual funds, endowments, and RIAs. Source: https://www.pinegap.ai/

qa_pairs.question: What are some key features of the Pinegap platform?
qa_pairs.answer: Pinegap offers features such as Company Primer, Curated Models with Insights, Key Debates & Event Analysis, Compare (value chain analysis), Readthroughs, and Quantamental analysis. It also features 'Pine AI Agents' that can monitor filings and track investment theses. Source: https://www.pinegap.ai/

qa_pairs.question: How can I try Pinegap?
qa_pairs.answer: You can sign up for a demo and a free trial through the form available on the Pinegap website. Source: https://www.pinegap.ai/

qa_pairs.question: What does Pinegap do?
qa_pairs.answer: Pinegap is an artificial intelligence and cybersecurity company that designs and delivers AI-powered cybersecurity platforms, predictive analytics solutions, and compliance tools to enterprise clients worldwide. Source: https://www.pinegap.ai/privacy-policy

qa_pairs.question: What kind of information does Pinegap collect from me?
qa_pairs.answer: Pinegap collects data you provide directly (account info, communications, uploaded content), data they collect automatically (platform usage data, device info, cookies), and data they receive from third parties (analytics providers, cloud infrastructure providers, marketing partners). Source: https://www.pinegap.ai/privacy-policy

qa_pairs.question: Who is the data controller for my information when I use Pinegap.ai?
qa_pairs.answer: In most cases, Pinegap acts as the Data Controller, determining the purposes and means of processing personal and organizational data collected through their Services. Source: https://www.pinegap.ai/privacy-policy

qa_pairs.question: Does this privacy policy apply to websites I access through Pinegap's services?
qa_pairs.answer: No, the privacy policy does not apply to third-party websites, services, integrations, or other entities that may be accessible through Pinegap's Services. Pinegap is not responsible for the privacy practices of third parties. Source: https://www.pinegap.ai/privacy-policy
